name: Spring Warrior (MSX)
description:
Take control of SpringWarrior and make sure that nature reaches the entire map.

The enemies will not leave you alone, only the most skilled players can paint the map.

=======================================

Edition Physical

To obtain the physical version, enter our store:

Spring Warrior - Physical Edition

=======================================

Download & installation

Download the .DSK and run it in an MSX emulator such as openMSX or blueMSX. 

We recommend openMSX.
